lines.text:
[after Townsend impulsively kisses Katrin]
How could you?
I like China very much. I like America too. I like all the places I haven't been.

[to Katrin]
Why can't we be unhappy together?

[to Townsend]
You seem to be like a Chinese garden fountain... everywhere one turns.

[to Fane]
Right now you and I are closer than we ever were... and further apart.

[to Katrin]
I think you're the most curious curio in all China.
They say the longer you watch it, the longer it takes.

[Offering scotch whiskey to Fane]
Stay full of this. Leaves no room for the cholera.
